name: Home Design Simulator
description:
Home Design Simulator - a game application where you can make your interior design in .
Think of repair of apartments? Afraid to buy furniture that can not come? Try to do interior design directly in your phone through our unique interior designer!
Select the object rotate place so as you wish. Virtual reality, this is very convenient and can be clearly seen.
Collect your room before you order furniture.
The interior of the future apartment is very important. Many different 3D models.
Gather your own bedroom or nursery do to your child. It's very simple, you can see his apartment on the background of the camera.
I joke with friends with BP as a joke. This is a very fun and funny.
Thank you for playing with us, leave us your feedback and we will consider it in future updates! Start your career as an interior designer for free right now!
